description:
If you live in Dorchester, Berkley or Charleston County and you suffered an injury or lost a loved one due to a workplace accident, a car accident or any other type of preventable tragedy, you can turn to The Steinberg Law Firm in Summerville, South Carolina for the aggressive representation and compassionate support you deserve.

Our dedicated and award-winning attorneys are fully prepared to help you secure the maximum amount of compensation for your injury, and over the past 10 years alone, our law firm has recovered more than $500 in settlements and awards for our plaintiff clients. We have achieved this level of success through our170+ years of combined legal experience, our exceptional trial and negotiation tactics, and our unwavering commitment to those we serve.

Originally founded in 1927, our law firm has been the go-to source for the injured and disabled across South Carolina's Lowcountry for more than 90 years, and we are proud to have been able to affect such positive changes in the lives of so many throughout our communities.

To find out more about how The Steinberg Law Firm can best serve you and your family during your most dire time of need, we invite you to contact our law office to receive a free, no-obligation evaluation of your claim.
